text: The 2016 Men's U23 Pan-American Volleyball Cup was the third edition of the bi-annual men's volleyball tournament, played by nine countries from September 5–10, 2016 in Guanajuato City, Mexico. ==Competing nations== {| class="wikitable" !width=33%|Group A !width=33%|Group B !width=33%|Group C |- | | | |} ==Preliminary round== *All times are in Central Standard Time (UTC−06:00) {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background:#ccffcc;"| |Team advances to semifinals |- | style="background:#dfefff;"| |Team advances to quarterfinals |} ===Group A=== |} |} ===Group B=== |} |} ===Group C=== |} |} ==Final round== ===Championship bracket=== ===Classification 9=== |} ===Quarterfinals=== |} ===Semifinals=== |} ===Seventh place match=== |} ===Fifth place match=== |} ===Bronze medal match=== |} ===Final=== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=40|Rank!!width=180|Team |- align=center; bgcolor=#ccffcc | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center; bgcolor=#ccffcc | |style="text- align:left;"| |- | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |4 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center; bgcolor=#ccffcc |5 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |6 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |7 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center |8 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |9 |style="text-align:left;"| |} {|class="wikitable" |bgcolor=#ccffcc|||Qualified for FIVB U23 World Championship |} ==Individual awards== *Most Valuable Player ** *Best Scorer ** *Best Setter ** *Best Opposite ** *Best Outside Hitters ** ** *Best Middle Blockers ** ** *Best Server ** *Best Digger ** *Best Receiver ** *Best Libero ** ==References== Category:Men's Pan-American Volleyball Cup Pan-American Category:2016 in Mexican sports Category:International volleyball competitions hosted by Mexico
title: 2016 Men's U23 Pan-American Volleyball Cup
